doc.plot: After a botched attempt at robbing a bank, lone survivor Rico hides from the police in a deserted warehouse where he meets a strange hermit. The hermit tells Rico four chilling tales: 1.) An escaped mental patient, 2.) a vampire preying upon a sick girl, 3.) A young man who meets his girlfriend's sinister father, 4.) a group of friends attacked by a werewolf while spending a night in the woods.
